pageTitle: 7/1/2007 Sound Affects: A Radio Playground | KFAI
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {959=The Firesign Theatre, the Beatles of comedy, bring you Boom Dot Bust, one of the holiday albums made by the 4 or 5 Crazy Guys between 1999 and 2001. This one is all about small town America celebrating the 4th of July. Welcome to Billville on the edge of the Gov. Bill Williams Memorial Tornado Preserve. Brought to you by U.S. Plus. An introduction to From Ark to Microchip: A History of Audio Art, by the Rev. Dwight Frizzell, presented for the Dakota Reader at the South Dakota Art Museum in Brookings.}
